name: Lily N' The Machine
description:
Fight the government robots in this short steampunk story about a girl and a rebel war machine. Play with a friend in this old style multiplayer inspirated by Towerfall. It works with only one keyboard, so you don't have to use a controller.

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2

tip: you can use Parsec to play remotely
https://parsec.app/

CONTROLS:
Robot: WASD to move and left control to punch (with right timing, you can also deflect incoming bullets!)
Girl:  ⇑ ⇐ ⇓ ⇒ to move and right control to shoot

the web resolution is a bit bugged - download for a better experience!

Mac keyboards doesn't have the right control key, so it is quite unplayable with that.
